mapper.select: SELECT a.group_id AS "groupId", ag.group_name AS "groupName" FROM ad_group_activity_conn a LEFT JOIN ad_group ag ON a.group_id = ag.id WHERE a.other_activity_id = #{activityId}
SELECT a.id AS "companyId", a.super_group_id AS "groupId", a.group_name AS "groupName" FROM ad_group a WHERE a.super_group_id IN (${ids})
SELECT id departmentId,department_name departmentName,ad_group_id companyId FROM ad_group_department WHERE ad_group_id IN (${ids})

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.activity_id AS "activityId", a.coupon_id AS "couponId", a.group_id AS "groupId", a.user_type AS "userType", a.create_user AS "createUser", a.other_activity_id AS "otherActivityId", a.create_date AS "createDate" FROM ad_group_activity_conn a WHERE a.activity_id = #{activityId} and #{groupNum} in (208,199,198,192,160) limit 1;
